motd: Change: Cast time now shifts to be equal to the caster's attack windup time if it would be lower than the usual cast time.

passive_2: Deal 75% AD physical damage to enemies in a radius centered around you (10 second cooldown).
motd: Hotfix: Cleave AD ratio increased to 75% AD from 60% AD. Cast time changed to champion's auto attack windup from 0.2 seconds.

passive_1: Basic attacks deal [40%|20%] AD physical damage to other nearby enemies.
Basic attacks deal [50%|25%] AD physical damage to other nearby enemies.

motd: Change: Crescent center point is now at champion's basic attack range (up to 200 units), instead of 125 units in front.
Hotfix-Bugfix: Fixed a bug where Poppy and Rengar could use its active effect from range.
Bugfix: Fixed a bug where it counted towards procs for Electrocute or Phase Rush.

passive_1: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of your AD physical damage to units around your target.
Your attacks deal up to 60% of your attack damage to units around your target, decaying down to 20% near the edge.
passive_2: Deals up to 100% of your attack damage to units around you, decaying down to 60% near the edge - 10 second cooldown.
